results.content:
KEEP UP THE GOOD TEACHING. THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR EXTREME PATIENCE IN KEEPING IT SIMPLE. 
FOR AN EXPERIENCED USER I KNOW HOW  DIFFICULT THAT MUST BE, TO SLOW DOWN, WHEN IT IS SO  SECOND NATURE FOR YOU TO DO THE CODING.  
BUT FOR A BEGINNER, GOING SLOW IS SO HELPFUL.  THERE IS NOTHING WORSE THAN  AN INSTRUCTOR WHO DECIDES TO  GO INTO  SOME EXTREME DETAIL AND I KNOW THAT IS SO TEMPTING FOR SOME INSTRUCTORS.  SOME INSTRUCTORS LIKE TO  OVER TEACH, HOPING THAT 'SOMETHING WILL STICK'.     
AGAIN, THANKS FOR YOUR  EXTREME PATIENCE IN KEEPING IT SIMPLE. 

SO MANY INSTRUCTORS CANNOT DO THAT.
